contextId.information: Here the words "saw" and "knew" share similar meanings and emphasize that Saul knew with certainty. AT: "Saul recognized" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
These two words mean almost the same thing and can be translated as one phrase. AT: "Know for sure" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublet]])
